definitions.definition: ( statistics ) Any measure of central tendency , especially any mean , the median , or the mode . [from c. 1735]
examples: You need to show some averages in an executive summary, show some samples of raw data in the document body, and move the full raw data to an appendix.

definitions.definition: ( law , marine ) Financial loss due to damage to transported goods; compensation for damage or loss. [from 15th c.]
Customs duty or similar charge payable on transported goods.
Proportional or equitable distribution of financial expense.
( sports ) An indication of a player 's ability calculated from his scoring record , etc.

main_definition: ( statistics ) Any measure of central tendency , especially any mean , the median , or the mode . [from c. 1735]
secondary_definitions: ( law , marine ) Financial loss due to damage to transported goods; compensation for damage or loss. [from 15th c.]
Customs duty or similar charge payable on transported goods.
Proportional or equitable distribution of financial expense.
( sports ) An indication of a player 's ability calculated from his scoring record , etc.

definitions.definition: The service that a tenant owed his lord , to be done by the animals of the tenant, such as the transportation of wheat, turf, etc.

main_definition: ( UK , law , obsolete ) The service that a tenant owed his lord , to be done by the animals of the tenant, such as the transportation of wheat, turf, etc.
